entry.title: Nithishkumar786/infoseek: InfoSeek is a lightweight, responsive web application that simplifies accessing information from Wikipedia. The project is designed to provide users with an intuitive platform to search and explore knowledge efficiently. Using the CCBP wiki-search API, it dynamically fetches and displays search results based on user input in real time.
entry.content: InfoSeek is a lightweight, responsive web application that simplifies accessing information from Wikipedia. The project is designed to provide users with an intuitive platform to search and explore knowledge efficiently. Using the CCBP wiki-search API, it dynamically fetches and displays search results based on user input in real time.
